title: Actions & Intents
subtitle: Decoupling *what* we want from *how* it's done.

leftBullets.title: The `Intent`
leftBullets.description: An immutable object describing *what* the user wants to do (e.g., 'Save', 'Select').

leftBullets.title: The `Action`
leftBullets.description: A class containing the logic for *how* to execute a specific `Intent`.

leftBullets.title: The `Shortcuts` Widget
leftBullets.description: Maps physical key presses (like Ctrl+S) to a semantic `Intent`.

leftBullets.title: The `Actions` Widget
leftBullets.description: Maps an `Intent` to the `Action` class that will handle it.
